title: An introduction to the worthy receiving the sacrament of the Lords Supper by that late learned minister of Gods holy word, William Pemble ... ; published since his death by his friend.
author: Pemble, William, 1592?-1623.
publisher: Printed by I.B. for Iames Boler, and are to be sold at the signe of the Mary gold in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Running title: Christian directions for receiving the sacrament.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
